posts.post_content: i'll take the ginter. please pm me with details on payment. thanks!

posts.post_title: BUMP - Revised Prices and NEW lot added...
posts.post_content:
I have a lot of 101 cigarette boxes and packs for sale, many of which are associated with the distribution of many non-sport sets.  The vast majority (over 90%) of the packs/boxes grade EX+.  Some still have original cigarettes.  Below is a spreadsheet detailing the brand and quantity of the packs available in this lot.  Price for the entire collection is $210.00 shipped!  This works out to approximately $2.00/pack.
